io.spine.server.delivery

Class Sender<I,M extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.Sender<I,M>

  • public class Sender<I,M extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    The sending part of the Delivery.

    As long as the delivery process is sharded, the messages are posted to the assigned sharded stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sender(DeliveryTag deliveryTag) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(I id, M message)
      Send the given message to the consuming part of this delivery, where the target with the specified id will be called to handle it.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(I id,
                 M message)
        Send the given message to the consuming part of this delivery, where the target with the specified id will be called to handle it.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the target entity
        message - the message to deliver to the target entity, packed into an envelope
